hooks.comment: Run ESLint auto-fix on TypeScript files
hooks.command: FILE=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // .path' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$FILE" ] && echo "$FILE" | grep -q '\.ts$'; then npx eslint --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.comment: Validate barrel exports for core module index files
hooks.command: FILE=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // .path' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$FILE" ] && echo "$FILE" | grep -q 'src/core/.*/index\.ts$'; then .claude/hooks/validate-barrel-exports.sh "$FILE" || exit 1; fi
